rules.description: Mu Mouse Mode Semicolon(;)+D to enter Mu Mouse Mode(default Mouse Move Mode); V to Mouse Left Click; N to Mouse Right Click; Q to quit Mu Mouse Mode; D: Mouse Move Mode, J/K/L/I/U/M/O/. to Mouse Left/Down/Right/Up/Up-Left/Down-Left/Up-Right/Down-Right; F: Mouse Fast Move Mode, like Mouse Move Mode but faster; S: Mouse Scroll Mode, J/K/L/I to Mouse Scroll Left/Down/Right/Up

manipulators.description: D -> mu_mouse_mode in mu_mode(holding ;)

to.shell_command: /usr/local/bin/terminal-notifier -title "Enter MuMouseMode" -message "J/K/L/I/U/M/O/. move mouse, V/N click mouse, S enter scroll mode, Q quit" -sender "org.pqrs.Karabiner-Elements.Preferences" -timeout 5

manipulators.description: D -> mu_mouse_mode in mu_mouse_mode

to.shell_command: /usr/local/bin/terminal-notifier -title "Already in MuMouseMode" -message "J/K/L/I/U/M/O/. move mouse, V/N click mouse, S enter scroll mode, Q quit" -sender "org.pqrs.Karabiner-Elements.Preferences" -timeout 5

manipulators.description: Q -> exit mu_mouse_mode
V -> left click in mu_mouse_mode
N -> right click in mu_mouse_mode
J -> move mouse left in mu_mouse_mode
K -> move mouse down in mu_mouse_mode
I -> move mouse up in mu_mouse_mode
L -> move mouse right in mu_mouse_mode
U -> move mouse left-up in mu_mouse_mode
M -> move mouse left-down in mu_mouse_mode
O -> move mouse right-down in mu_mouse_mode
. -> move mouse right-down in mu_mouse_mode
F -> mu_mouse_move_fast_mode in mu_mouse_mode

to.shell_command: /usr/local/bin/terminal-notifier -title "Enter MuMouseMode fase move" -message "J/K/L/I/U/M/O/. move mouse, V/N click mouse, S enter scroll mode, D return default move" -sender "org.pqrs.Karabiner-Elements.Preferences" -timeout 5

manipulators.description: D -> mu_mouse_move_mode in mu_mouse_mode
J -> move mouse left fast in mu_mouse_fast_mode
K -> move mouse down fast in mu_mouse_fast_mode
I -> move mouse up fast in mu_mouse_fast_mode
L -> move mouse right fast in mu_mouse_fast_mode
U -> move mouse left-up fast in mu_mouse_fast_mode
M -> move mouse left-down fast in mu_mouse_fast_mode
O -> move mouse right-up fast in mu_mouse_fast_mode
. -> move mouse right-down fast in mu_mouse_fast_mode
switch to mu_mouse_scroll_mode in mu_mouse_mode

to.shell_command: /usr/local/bin/terminal-notifier -title "Enter MuMouseMode scroll" -message "J/K/L/I/U/M/O/. scroll mouse, V/N click mouse, D/F enter move mode, Q quit" -sender "org.pqrs.Karabiner-Elements.Preferences" -timeout 5

manipulators.description: J -> scoll left in mu_mouse_scroll_mode
K -> scoll down in mu_mouse_scroll_mode
I -> scoll up in mu_mouse_scroll_mode
L -> scoll right in mu_mouse_scroll_mode

rules.description: Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Google Chrome: Command + Control + Shift + c
Sublime Text: Command + Control + Shift + t

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'if (frontmost of application "Pennywise") then' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Pennywise" to click button 3 of window 1' -e 'else' -e 'do shell script "open -a Pennywise"' -e 'end if'

rules.description: Espanso enable: Command + Control + Shift + e
